AnonymousMessage.title: AnonymousMessage
AnonymousMessage.description: Represents an anonymous message submitted by a user.

to.description: The recipient of the anonymous message.

message.description: The content of the anonymous message.

createdAt.description: Timestamp indicating when the message was created.

/anonymous_messages/{messageId}.description: Stores anonymous messages submitted by users. Anyone can read, but only authenticated anonymous users can create.
